item.title: The game of "Bulls and Cows" : A python implementation
item.description: Recently, a friend taught me a simple game of bulls and cows. This game goes like this. There are two players, A and B. A thinks of a 4-letter word and asks B to guess it. Assume that A thought of “link” and B guesses “lean”. The bulls are the number of letters which are common to both words at the same location in both words , for example “l” is a bull in “link” and “lean”.
